      boolean getColor()
      returns the color of the piece, true = white, false = black
      Location getLoc()
      returns the location of the piece, 0-indexed
      int getValue()
      Returns the material value of the piece, positive for a white piece, negative for a black piece
      boolean isInCheck(Board b, int index)
      This method returns true if the piece is giving check to the opposite colored king
